caption.p:
Estimates of the global direct dust–climate feedback. Results are calculated from the ensemble of CMIP5 simulations (black dash-dotted lines), and from CESM simulations with the BASE (blue dashed lines) and PHYS (green solid lines) emission modules. The total feedback (top) could equal a substantial fraction of the climate system’s total direct aerosol feedbacks
29 . The direct dust–climate feedback ( λ dust) consists of somewhat larger opposing contributions from cooling SW interactions (middle) and warming LW interactions (bottom)
